name: Mastodon Single Column (Simple)
description: A very simple mix-up of mastodon's display, changing the multi-column into a single-column with tabs.
additional_info:
PSA: I am not a professional coder by any means, I just wanted something that made Mastodon easier to look at (I find the multi-column format overwhelming). So I'd consider this a constant WIP

Feel free to take this code and modify it for your own styles - it's not exactly ground-breaking. Suggestions to improve this are always appreciated.

To add your mastodon instance: Go to Manage Styles > Mastodon Single Column (Simple) - Edit > Applies To - Add > Write in your instance + set filter to URL's on Domain.
